alert.note: Alert for Coastal Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 12 at 3:21AM EST until March 12 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In South Carolina, Coastal Horry County. In North Carolina, Inland Pender, Coastal Pender, Coastal Brunswick, Coastal New Hanover, Inland Brunswick and Inland New Hanover Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to noon EST today. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
